snippet: The changes require that the companies meet so-called good manufacturing practices, which include testing for contamination from pathogens.
abstract: Food and Drug Administration updates safety requirements for producers of infant formula, giving them greater leeway to enforce standards that are already met by most manufacturers.
lead_paragraph: The changes require that the companies meet so-called good manufacturing practices, which include testing for contamination from pathogens.
